ygData.subject: Re: everquest dating for single gamers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well said. I don t agree with your arguement, but it is well thought out. I think the problem is the choices of his exclusivity. If he want a MI dating club,
ygData.messageBody:
Well said. I don't agree with your arguement, but
it is well thought out. I think the problem is the
choices of his exclusivity. If he want a MI dating club,
fine, but then call it that. Not the
"EverquestDatingClub", because it's not.<br><br>Perhaps
MISingleStraightEverquestDatingClub is what he's really going for? I'm not interested
in that kind of club...so I would have just skipped
right over that invite. That's an annoyance I can live
with...just like getting dieting e-mail and snail-mail, when
I'm actually trying to gain weight! ;)<br><br>So, no
bad feelings...let's all just get
along!<br><br>Jim<br>CoJim, Woodelf Druid, 26th level, Prexus
server<br>Shaojiku, Iksar Monk, 15th level, Prexus server
